title: Lithuania Choses Embraer C-390 Millenium as ‘Next Generation’ Military Cargo Aircraft
content: The C-390 will supplement the C-27J, strengthening the Lithuanian Air Force and supporting interoperability with NATO partners. Lithuania announced on Jun. 19, 2025 the selection of the Embraer C-390 Millenium military cargo aircraft as its next airlifter, an…
